name: tiny & Tall Gleipnir
description: tiny & Tall: Gleipnir, Part One is a classic yet modern point'n'click adventure, inspired by LucasArt's legendary titles. Two barely competent and charmingly inept blacksmiths find themselves contractually bound to the Norse gods and have to explore a lovingly handcrafted world in a quest for unusual and magical objects. But while they look for these ingredients, the sinister gaze of Loki, the Trickster god, casts an evil shadow on their path...Solve (not so) convoluted puzzles, talk to excentric characters and discover an epic Norse legend!	        Key Features  Old-school gameplay with a modern realization  A pair of adorable character, one slightly less so than the other  Lots of jokes, almost none directed against the fourth wall  More than 50 handpainted (on a computer) levels  A unique soundtrack  Scared of opaque point'n'clicks? This one's got an entirely optional clue system  It is pixel art  1920*1080 of 'em
